page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN SANDBACH
page.content: THERE IS VERY LITTLE INDUSTRY IN SANDBACH AND MANY PEOPLE FROM OUR AREA TRAVEL TO MANCHESTER AND MERSEYSIDE ON THE M6.THEREFORE SANDBACH IS BECOMING A{COMMUTOR}TOWN.SOME PEOPLE HAVE REASONABLY PAID{EMPLOYMENT}AT LOCAL ENGINEERING FIRMS,FACTORIES AND JOINERS YARDS.THE HOTELS IN THE AREA AND THE{MOTORWAY}SERVICES EMPLOY QUITE A FEW PEOPLE,MANY OF THEM WOMEN,BUT THE THE WAGES ARE NOT VERY GOOD AND THE JOBS ARE MOSTLY ONLY PART TIME AND SEASONAL.SANDBACH HAS ONLY A SMALL{SHOPPING CENTRE}AND THERE ARE FEW JOBS AVAILABLE WORKING IN SHOPS. MANY PEOPLE HAVE TO TRAVEL TO WORK OUTSIDE THE AREA TO SURROUNDING TOWNS E.G. HANLEY AND CREWE.AT THE MOMENT THERE ARE LABOURING JOBS ON THE NEW ROAD AVIALBLE FOR SOME YOUNG MEN.
